about_the_game:
Feeling a bit bored at work? Come fishing!

Fishing On My Desktop is an idle fishing game that runs as a floating button on your desktop. Whether you’re working, studying, watching movies, or even playing other games, you can enjoy the fun of fishing at the same time!

Interesting Fishing Experience

  • Just a click to start fishing—no complex controls needed.

  • Fish in rivers, lakes, and oceans.

  • Collect over 100 different types of fish.

  • Unique rods and bait options.

  • Some unexpected catches: crabs, pearls, jellyfish, message bottles, and even treasure chests…

And

  • The cutest cat in the world.

  • 3 story-driven NPCs.

  • Mysterious hidden fishing spots.

Come and experience the joy of desktop fishing!
